name: xylib - library for reading x-y data
short_description: xylib is a portable library for reading x-y data from powder diffraction, spectroscopy and other experimental methods. Supported formats: VAMAS, pdCIF, Bruker, Philips, Rigaku DAT, Sietronics CPI, DBWS/DMPLOT, Koalariet XDD and others.
